name: Project Meerkobra
description:
Project Meerkobra is a vertical slice of an in-progress 3D Platformer made by Studio Hex. The game can be played with either keyboard and mouse or with a controller.

Join Meeko & Steak as they travel around Egypt collecting pieces of a Scarab tablet to gain entry into the great pyramid.

Updated 14/08/2018 - New mechanics, updated visuals, redone menus, full controller support.
